paper_abstract: In this review, we present a brief introduction on the transformation electromagnetics theory and several novel applications. We mainly focus on a radar illusion device, a microwave bend structure, a flattened Luneburg lens, a planar focusing lens antenna, and a three-dimensional broadband carpet cloak. These devices are designed with either general transformation optics or quasi-conformal mapping, which are implemented using metamaterials and validated by experiments, showing high performances. paper_title: Transformation electromagnetics and its applications (Invited paper)
